Review.Contenu: Very slow delivery times, almost scam you. they forget you again and make u wait 5 hours again.Go to a other site for way better service

Well waited online 7 hours at night, messaging from live chat was alwayd "they deliver within hour" "im contacting delivery department".. Play time is precious and order was placed cause of the promise. No apologies, no compensation for waited time.Can't recommend

Review.Contenu: Cannot delivery currency on time very bad service unfortunately because I liked them very much in the past.Refused to make it right over $2 thinking they could buy a review delete with a 5% coupon after lying to me taking over 5 hours and having their employee treated like trash.Asked me to contact a manager so I tried and the customer service agent Lin who is apparently gold support refused to get one and told me to wait 9 hours for a manager even though THEY requested to talk to me.

Did not complete my order. A week later and still have not recieved all items. Have been promised and promised. But seems to me that I'm just being messed around and promised things to shut me up.Have wasted a lot of time chasing this, but got no where

Review.Titre: I got a ban the day after delivery

Review.Contenu: Got banned immediately, do not recommend this service. Even when moving small amounts of currency.

Review.Titre: I’ve been waiting for 3 hr now and…

Review.Titre: Got banned a few days after the trade
Review.Contenu: Got banned a few days after the trade. I traded items back as advised and still got flagged. Gutted as just spent 400 points on stash tabs, Appealing the decision with GGG but my hopes are not high. DO NOT TRUST, GGG has upped their detection of this.

Review.Titre: PoE Account was banned after purchase!
Review.Contenu: PoE Account was banned after purchase!Update: I was contacted by Poecurrency and offered a refund when I delete this bad review! I have a screenshot of this conversation. If this review gets deleted, the risk of being banned is hidden from other customers. This is very disappointing. They should have just offered the refund without trying to manipulate this legit review and put a customer under pressure to delete a review.

This is one of the worse experiences I’ve ever had. They advertise delivery in 15 minutes on average. What they don tell you is if you place a larger order for 200 exalts in Poe then the delivery time could be as high as 2 hours. I waited 2 and a half hours for delivery. During the whole process I stayed on chat with their support and requested updates every 30 minutes. While their demeanor was friendly enough if you asked a question they didn’t want to answer they would copy and paste a generic answer and ignore you. My advise is find another company to buy currency from if your going to buy any real amount of currency.

Review.Titre: DO NOY BUY FROM THESE SCAMMERS
Review.Contenu: i have spend over $100 at poecurrency before and keep getting banned I've lost all my accounts and all my money. they are now asking to see my credit card front side out of the blew and no one should be asked for it. i highly recommend do not buy from them you WILL get banned and will lose your items

Order was late.  Customer service was useless (never replied to me, tried contacting 6 times). Tried asking for refund and “Scott” closed the live chat instead.Reply: You didn’t list a delivery speed. Your online rep said 15minutes, and it was 35. You also didn’t say anything about your customer service in your reply, don’t send me emails saying I can change my review when even your response sucks.

STAY AWAYWaited more than 6 hours ingame for my items and support kept telling me they would rush my order but nothing happende, when i asked for a refund i got ignored by the support, TWICE!have had orders with them before with the same problem of dumb delivery times, not worth the wait, and considering the latest one ived call them borderline scammers

Review.Titre: There 100% refund on undelivered or delayed items is false advertising
Review.Contenu: After 1 hr I contacted customer service to see how long till my order would arrive they said within 1 hr so 1 1/2 hrs later I contact costumer service asking where my order is I need to get off they said hold on someone will attend to you right now that right now took 40 min which I got no response from seller so I asked customer service to give me a refund for the 3 hr delay they replied with the guy is coming right now which that right now took another 30 min horrible customer service

Review.Titre: 15 minutes was what was promised on the…
Review.Contenu: 15 minutes was what was promised on the website, it took an hour and 48 minutes for the item that I had ordered to deliver on to my account, not only was this misleading but not promised from the website. No ramification was given. 2/5 tbh.

My account was forever ban after using this service just now .That account i play for 4 years is gone forever just like that. If anyone of you guy read this then do not use your account you love to trade just like me. My journey of poe end here.

Review.Titre: Steals personal information and will not refund if you refuse to give them your ID and CC card photo
Review.Contenu: After placing an order, if you refuse to send them a picture of your ID and credit card, they'll not only not deliver your goods but they'll refuse to refund your payment.   Had to dispute with my bank to get the money back.  Horrible business.  They also sell your information and expect to be hacked if you go through their forced "verification" rules.

Review.Titre: I gave this company numerous chances
Review.Contenu: I gave this company numerous chances. The first two times I went there everything was fine and I recieved my purchase within fifteen minutes. The past three times ( I’m one to give people second even third chances ) has taken 2-4 hours to receive my product and that was only after I threatened I wanted a refund. The company left me in the dark as to what was going on and just kept telling me will trade soon. After learning my lesson three times I will not be returning to this company

Review.Titre: delivery took over 48 hrs and was…

I do the "where's my order?" 30 minutes later and get "stay online and wait." 2 hours later, same thing. So I tell them I want my money back, you told me you had the stock and now you don't." 3 days later and their refusal to refund my money, they finally had the stock in hand.

Review.Contenu: They continued to charge my credit card until I canceled it. Dont use them they stole money from me and acted like they did nothing wrong. Services were great until I got billed a 2nd and 3rd time with no order placed. You have been warned if you want to keep your money dont use them!!

I refused and asked for my money back. They would no longer respond and didnt refund my money or give when what I paid for. Total Scam.

Every single time after buying im contact8ng support to ask when i will recive my currency, answer is alway"order is prepared stay online". Last zime i got my currency day later. And jow im waiting again for fck.... 4 hours and i know i will not get it today. Dont buy there if u need it fast. Waiting time is not normal,l. And this is 100000% my last order on this site

Review.Titre: 1.5 hours for first contact and then…
Review.Contenu: 1.5 hours for first contact and then had to wait 30+ mins after first contact to get my finished order.Not really the wait i was hoping for, but they did deliver in the end.Update: Was told all their delivery guys was on national holiday but one, which caused the delay.not sure if thats true or just a excuse so ived still advice ppl to take the "10" min. delivery time with a grain salt..update2: rating lowered from 4* due other later orders also taking way to long for no valid reason.

Review.Titre: First order was pretty ok - Second extremely slow
Review.Contenu: First order was pretty good, a little slow. Second order however was over 2 hours of waiting in game, which they state otherwise will be delivered under that time frame (50 minutes).. Very long potential wait times for small orders (10 exalted orbs). Will not order from here again

The supplier showed up 3 separate occasions never delivered anything and when I finally got them to deliver something they only delivered one item out of Around 15 . I had ordered and i and i only ordered 50 of that item and they delivered a 150 of them and thinks this is OK. The service was beyond terrible could not write  Proper English so I could not understand half of what they had written down,  Out of literally hundreds of purchases I have made online with my usual company for this game I have never ever experienced anything as terrible as the service I received and being a first time customer this will also be last time.

Review.Titre: I would give ZERO if I could!!
Review.Contenu: I would give ZERO if I could!!! They are selling stuff that they don’t actually have!! WHAT IS THIS?  Don’t recommend to anyone!! This service is full of liars!!! If you don’t have something then don’t try o sell it !!!!  RIDICULOUS!! And this was my third experience with this service. I ordered 2 exalt and 250 chaos and it took 2 hours and me threatening to file a complaint with paypal in order to receive my items.  Do yourself a favor and shop elsewhere!

I ordered 20X Exalted orbs from poecurrency.com. Right away I contacted the live chat and asked how long it would take to be delivered and was told to stay online and it would be delivered shortly. After waiting one hour I contacted them again and they said the same thing. This repeated for 16 hours with them only telling me "They will rush them". After waiting over 16 hours the final time I contacted the live chat after multiple agents closing the chat on me I told them i was about to request a refund. they told me to wait 10 more minutes and I still received nothing.Dont trust these guys. The try to sell you stuff they do not have. something so little as 20 exalted orbs they do not have in stock so i would not risk ever spending a large amount of money here. If i could give them 0 stars i would have.BAD COMPANY - STAY AWAY

Review.Titre: Good thing its a free game

These guys are terrible. They jerked me around for over 6 hours and never did fully fill my order. Im calling my bank and stopping payment. BUYER BEWARE
3 hour delivery. Horrible chat service with repeating copy paste messages interchanging with broken english and informal messages. Do not order

Review.Titre: They claim on their website to be 5-50…
Review.Contenu: They claim on their website to be 5-50 minute delivery. It isn't.I waited over 24 hours to get my currency and they still didn't have it ready, so I got a refund instead, which I'm still currently waiting for ($67..I know I threw a lot of money)The thing is, I used this site twice before hand and it wasn't AS bad, but it took about 6 hours or so for the delivery.Last thing, they NEVER tell you they're out of stock on anything until after you've made your purchase. Anytime I'd order orbs of scouring or alchemy orbs, I'm always told "We're out of stock, can we give you exalts or chaos orbs in replacement?" Which I would normally agree on, but then they're out of stock on those as well???Would highly recommend going somewhere else, this site is NOT reliable. They don't even update their site with a "Out of Stock" sign on their items. Very unprofessional.
I placed an order, the site said 15 minute deliveries.  I waited 45 before contacting support, and was told I had to wait 2 more hours.

Review.Titre: My account got banned after purchasing…
Review.Contenu: My account got banned after purchasing from your site. I traded a rare item but still got flagged apparently.
Wait times are waaaay to long compared to other sites on the market. save your time, money, and stress for other sites.

They make excuses to keep you waiting while they fulfill their back orders.  In real time they have ZERO stock.  They literally playing the game and waiting for RNG to drop the item you trying to buy and then sell it, but they take your money first and hold on to it.  Shady business practice.  If you have no stock you should disable your buy button.  No body got time to stay online all day just to wait and hope you will deliver.  Customer service was also useless and did nothing to fix the issue.  I gave them many chances to fix the problem but would answer with generic messages saying to "stay online".   Terrible first time experience will not recommend them.Update:  They will also have someone go to every review and post a generic message like this:  "Hello, if you have any problems please contact us by 24/7 online live chat, we will try to resolve it sooner and better. Thank you."  If you have clearly read my review I have dealt with your online live chat where they stop answering my question and leave me waiting.

Review.Contenu: Seller had to be reminded twice that the service was not delivered and then did not produce everything I paid for.
Terrible customer service. Unable to communicate, chat function doesn't work. Did not deliver what I ordered.

Review.Titre: Went here to buy some POE Currency
Review.Contenu: Went here to buy some POE Currency, Live chat told me '' Sorry we are out off stock, we going to refund you  gonna take 10 mins'', 2 hours later still havent got the refund and the live chat say '' wait 20 more mins we are really busy '' , How can they be really busy if they are out of stock , also a refund take 2 seconds to do. I'll really dont recommand going whit them.Edit: Went back 9 hours later, they still havent refund me, but they had stock but now they are telling me :''As your order amount is a little large, we need the following pictures to verify the legitimacy of your payment：First: A screenshot of your payment page. Please log in your PayPal and find this transaction, then send us a screenshot of the transaction detail.Second: A screenshot of your hand-held payment card which you used to pay for this order. Please just show the last four digits, you can block out other digits.'' For a 12,07$ CAD Transaction this website is just a joke, i'll really dont recommand to buy there.

Review.Titre: They have a banner that says "lowest…
Review.Contenu: They have a banner that says "lowest price guarantee", I went to purchase from them, but also checked 2 other sites.  In this case, I'm looking for Harvest League-PC-Standard Exalted Orbs.  They list for .76 per.  Another site sells for .69 and a 3rd for .51.  They are actually the highest price, not the lowest.  I asked their customer service about matching price or what they do.  They do nothing apparently.  This is what they said:ElsaPlease tell me your payment email or order number? Thank you.You — Please update your infoI haven't bought yetElsadid you order~You — Please update your infoWas comparing sites, and saw thatElsaour site shows the newest priceif you need you can buy it here toothanks for your timeYou — Please update your infoSo you don't actually price match or beat their price, you just have a sign that says you're the lowest but you're not.Ok, coolSo... Buyer beware.  If they can't even be honest about their banners all over the place, I'm not giving them my CC info or trusting delivery.

A screenshot of your payment page. Please log in to your PayPal andfind this transaction, then send us a screenshot of the transactiondetails.2. A screenshot of your hand-held payment card which you used to payfor this order. Please show the last 4 digits of your payment card.Why Do We Have to Verify the Payment?1. Some buyers under 18 years old who pay with their parents' paymentcards without the permission.3. Unusual Purchase pattern from you. (Large Amount or High Frequencyof Purchase)4. High chargeback rate is coming from your country.If you have any additional questions, feel free to contact us via LiveChat.POECurrency Support.Days later and still nothing .. im just letting paypal handle the refund ... STAY AWAY FROM THIS SITE

So i decide to buy from this website cause is a little bit cheaper than the other one i was using . I paid $99.05 via paypal . Paypal confirm the payment to my email i check my debit card and the money is gone . And they still telling me that they didnt got my money .. and the money is on hold cause paypal decide to put it there .. after i google a lot about this i found that if they are a new seller paypal or they had issues with refounds and or they didnt provide documents . Paypal will hold they payment till the investigate they seller account is legit .. in that scenario thats not my problem .. i already payed if paypal hold the money i send cause they didnt fix their paypal thats not my problem and they are telling me that i need to wait till paypal give them the money that can days or months who knows ... how is this possible how a website works like this ... i bough from many  websites and never had a problem i called my bank to tell them why they are holding they payment and they told me the payment has been made and the seller should know that paypal hold the payment for them but still they need to deliver the item cause they will get it when paypal decide ... this is the worst thing ever happend to me buying somewhere and on live chat they are just transfering me to differents agents ...

Review.Titre: If I could give negative stars I would
Review.Contenu: If I could give negative stars I would. This possibly has to be the worst interaction ive had with any type of site. The site says 15 min delievery. I waited about 40 mins and then contacted customer service who stated that it was busy and may take longer due to a recent update/new season. I then waited 40 more mins. "Ryan" my customer service stated that I didn't know anything and I should be more patient. I asked Ryan if he knew how long this would take. He told me to wait longer. Ryan then went on a long dissertation how I didn't know anything. I then sent an email to there customer service stating how Ryan hasn't been the best customer service. I get a reply that says " Ryan has been fired" clearly he wasn't because he kept contacting me.  I then asked how I could get my product. They wanted me to send 2 pictures. One of my credit card. The second of my receipt from PayPal account showing I paid.  I asked why. They said they needed to verify I didn't steal this card. PayPal is the one who is verifying my payment not this site.  I then asked for a refund. He then started questioning why I needed a refund. This went on for another 30 mins. Ryan is still messaging me asking  why, and refusing to give me my refund. I now have to wait 30 days to receive my money back from PayPal.  DONT USE THIS SITE.
Say they can beat someone elses price to get you to review then they cant 😂

The seller didnt noticed and I also didnt know if Im getting a promo goodies, or if I was given less on my previous purchase and now Im being "refunded". The seller didnt want it back untill after a couple of hours. And now I have to deal with it and I already spent some of it so I cant give it all back. Yea, its a mess. Please, sellers, be more carefull next time.

Review.Titre: Too much time to deliver the goods

People that buy currency do not have many hours to play, that's why we buy currency for real money in the first place. Waiting for more than an hour is not a good experience.

Very disappointed. I checked with their customer service before ordering, they said they had all items. Placed order 1 minute later. Then after eventually receiving 3/4 of my order, nothing. Asked for a refund on the item that they lied about. They offered an exchange but the value was nowhere near the same. Demanded refund. 10 minutes later, they “found” the items they said were not available. Had to wait for a new contact in game. Should not be this complicated, why can’t they actually check inventory and be honest?

Today morning i order 1 item from web. Was waiting about 30min and no one came. I contact with support,Christi i thing and was informed that item is ready for me, i get an email that item is ready and waiting for me in game ,and i should back to game and wait. Was waiting 5-10min ,again no one came. Had to go work. When i back after work,again no one contact me in game, so i back too support. This time another person Cindy informed me that price of item i have order is CHANGE for bigger, and they can't give me item because price change!!!In morning item was avaible but on evening not cause price change.Still have email from morning that item is ready and please stay in game and wait. Review.Titre: The added security steps to honest…
Review.Contenu: The added security steps to honest customers are suspicious at the beginning.  I was apprehensive to added questions.  It "felt" like I was being set-up for something.

Review.Titre: The service was way faster before
Review.Contenu: The service was way faster before, now it’s getting slower and the live chat doesn’t provide me eta…

Review.Titre: The bans are automatic and quick...
Review.Contenu: I was kicked offline and banned within 5 minutes of completing this trade. The same thing happened a year ago to another account. I'm not sure if it's the seller's account getting banned and traced to me but I followed PoECurrency's instructions perfectly. I ordered a rather small amount of currency too so it wasn't like I was buying mirrors. Support doesn't do anything in this case other than tell you to appeal, for which there's obviously no valid excuse you can provide the game company. Save your money as you will not get it back. I'd give this a 1 out of 5, except I purchased knowing the inherent risk.Edit:Editing this due to what has happened after posting my initial review. POECurrency has gone as far as to ask for my account information so that they can submit an appeal on my behalf (like I somehow can't do that myself). The last thing I want is an appeal done in broken English. I have already appealed and it was denied - which is fair enough, I know I broke the rules. They have edited their response to this review to a completely new message claiming that this has never happened before. Several other reviewers would tend to disagree with that. Additionally, it happened to me more than a year ago the first time so there's been two bans already just with one customer. They have emailed me a few times pushing me towards their live chat and have even gone as far as to send me a text message about this review, it's very pushy!There's one line in the vendor's reply that really caused me to want to edit this instead of leaving it alone. "We dont know whether you have break other game rules or not". I'm sorry, but no... other than the trades done with this company the account hasn't even sent a single chat message since its creation a few months ago. The ban was under 5 minutes from them trading me 200 divines in exchange for a few rares that I even chaos/exalted in advance.Overall, I know it's hard for Poecurrency to circumvent auto bans. I did my best to avoid it by getting the account above level 90 but I guess simply being above 25 and trading rares no longer cuts it for safety. I'd be fine saying "whatever" but this company is going out of their way to play victim and I just find that irritating. I wish I could respond to their "reply" without needing to edit the base review but that's how this site works.
Delivery is fast, but delivery guy rushed/pushed me to much, it's impossible to empty stash as fast as he/she wants to

Review.Titre: Customer service could use some work
Review.Contenu: Customer service could use some work. After asking for an eta on delivery, I was asked to send a picture of the paypal transaction, and my credit card. After refusing the latter, they stopped responding to me. After opening a case on paypal, the issue was resolved, and my order was filled. The delivery however took a little over an hour...

So, customer service was very helpful with getting delivery going right away which was great. When I recieved my delivery the person delivering it did not have the whole amount ordered. They offered some other things to make it up but did not come up to what I ordered in total. Felt kind of shorted.

Review.Titre: They took awhile but I did have a large…
Review.Contenu: They took awhile but I did have a large order and messed up so it was kinda my fault but not much communication still is nice and will probably use again

They fulfilled the order but only after a lot of headache involved. 1) If your going to sell digital currency by the hundreds you should know how much you have in stock. I don't blame the suppliers but the merchant for not knowing what they have. 2) If you need to verify and ask for a receipt and it get provided to you by picture why do you still ask for a form of ID?  3) You shouldn't give people such a short expectancy time if you can't fulfill it on time. That transaction and chat and going through my phone for a snapshot, sending it to the computer, altering image to withhold sensitive info from picture, and finally getting the order took over 2 and a half hours.

Review.Titre: The service has been great since I…
Review.Contenu: The service has been great since I started using it, up until last week. They have changed something in operations. I used to get all my purchase in by one person. Now,all the sudden someone will show up, give you half or less of your purchase, vanish, and then later on someone else will join to finish. No warnings, no messages. Kinda feels disrespecting to consumers. Even a message saying that's how it goes now, would be sufficient for me to raise back to 5 stars.

Review.Contenu: Cheap and accurate but somewhat slow.I purchased about 4 inventories full of things, and it was much cheaper than expected. As I said, that's not a terrible amount of time, but it was a bit of a wait.

Review.Titre: Great service / needs to update customer
Review.Contenu: The customer service was very helpful, and all the items I ordered were delivered. The only thing holding back for a 5 star is communication. It would be nice to get an update that the order is getting prepared and have a time frame for completion. If the order is going to go past the time frame another update would be nice. My order took around 1hr 15min after some confusion was cleared up. I would use again.

Review.Titre: Did not have what I ordered
Review.Contenu: Did not have what I ordered. So asked if I could change to other currency. Little bit annoying but I accepted it. Over all communication was good and quick. The person delivering did muck around for a bit before getting my order. Not as smooth as previous purchase. But overall I'm reasonably happy.

Easy and relatively fast (10-40 minutes) depending on size of order. Would be nice if they messaged your gamer tag with an ETA. Currently they only message you when they are ready so it can be unexpected and abrupt. Just expect a delay if you are ordering large quantities.

A few days prior ordering currency for my son was not so smooth, it took over 2 hours for the prior order.Which to me is unacceptable and was not offered any convenience condolences or anything, even an apology.juat an excuse as to how busy you guys were, to make up for the 2 hour wait. In the mean time my son's $600 order was received by an un-named competitor in less than 3 minutes.with the I may try a few more orders in the future, hopefully things remain smooth.Side note, card/order verification process was perfect, and very timely. I even got a call from nice lady to inform me that my stuff was ready for a pickup (If you're that nice lady and remember a dude being at work, send me a message in PoE ^^).The only thing that wasn't to my liking is the delivery time, which was around 24 hours, slightly less actually. But that's me being a douche, overall a great service that I highly recommend to those of us who don't have the time to farm all day because we have a work and such. If you just want to get the top tier gear for cash then you're a weiner and don't do that! :DIf I may give a suggestion, allow the customers to choose the approximate time of delivery because it just happens that we aren't at PC and have to wait a bit more.

Review.Titre: Use your receipt if it doensnt show up, Service is good.
Review.Contenu: Had initial slow-down waiting on a response. They did finally respond and told me to wait in game- it arrived within 5 minutes after that. The process took almost an hour. This was my first order and I ordered while creating an account, so the order did not show up in my account. But I have an email receipt from Pay Pal to show the customer service. Providing receipt of payment and keeping in communication, they did fulfill the order! Thanks for the fast service. Some of these services are in different countries so Pay Pal, Google Pay, or your bank may slow down the process. This company has no control over how fast the payment verification goes. But they do have control over communicating with the customer. I gave them a chance, and it worked out well. Thanks POEcurrency.
